su.whs.watl.text

Class TextLayoutEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • su.whs.watl.text.TextLayout
      • su.whs.watl.text.TextLayoutEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentView.OptionsChangeListener, su.whs.watl.text.Highlights.HighlightAnimationListener, ITextLayout

    public class TextLayoutEx
extends TextLayout
    supports for pagination and complex geometry layouts per page supports different geometry for pages supports serialization of 'page split info' for fast layout at restore Created by igor n. boulliev on 30.05.15.
